arts.ttl: Ashvir Singh Johal believes his style of football is "Not a risk" as Morecambe prepare to play Boreham Wood
arts.sum: Over the course of Morecambe’s first four games under Johal’s management, it’s clear he had a very particular way of playing, with a strong emphasis on maintaining possession of the ball through short, intricate passes. “The goal ( Gwion Edwards against Forest Green ) is the example, we have to make short passes to draw the opposition (out), we have to make them want to press, and when they press, it opens them up and we have space to play in between the lines.
